options.additionalInfo: For personal, school, or hobby projects
For non-business critical sites and apps

questions.question: How many people are you protecting?

options.additionalInfo: Protect your data centers from malicious traffic and DDoS attacks

questions.question: What level of support are you looking for?

sidenavCopy.title: Support levels and cost may vary by plan tier

addons.name: Argo Smart Routing
addons.description: Argo intelligently optimizes routes across the Cloudflare network to increase performance and improve the user experience.

addons.name: Network Interconnect
addons.description: Connect your network infrastructure directly to Cloudflare's network for a more reliable and secure experience than connecting over the public Internet.

addons.name: Load Balancing
addons.description: Load Balancing provides continuous availability of your critical resources. It guards against service disruptions using local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover.

addons.name: Video Stream
addons.description: Cloudflare Stream makes streaming high-quality video at scale, easy and affordable.

addons.name: Cloudflare Network Interconnect
addons.description: Connect your network infrastructure directly to Cloudflare's network for a more reliable and secure experience than connecting over the public Internet.

addons.name: Browser Isolation
addons.description: Browser Isolation is faster than any legacy remote browser. Natively integrated in the Cloudflare Zero Trust policy builder, it allows administrators to allow, block, or isolate any security or content category and application group.

addons.name: Cloudflare Images
addons.description: Store, resize, and optimize images at scale with Cloudflare Images.

addons.name: Automatic Platform Optimization
addons.description: Switch to a single plugin for CDN, intelligent caching, and other key WordPress optimizations with Cloudflare's Automatic Platform Optimization. See performance improvements of up to 300%
addons.price: From $5/mo with Free Plan. Included in other plans.

addons.name: Cache Reserve
addons.description: Improve cache hit ratios by automatically storing  cacheable files in Cloudflare's persistent object storage buckets and eliminate egress costs from unnecessary requests.
addons.price: Cost based on data volume stored.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Free Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Free Application Services plan because it provides the best value for personal or hobby web applications and can self-serve when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Pro Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Pro Application Services plan because it provides the best value for professional web applications that aren't business-critical.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Business Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Business Application Services plan because it provides the best value for small businesses operating online.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Enterprise Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Enterprise Application Services plan because you indicated that you have mission-critical applications, would like to speak to a live person when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit product because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic WAN)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic WAN product because you indicated that you want to replace your MPLS WAN.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit product because you indicated that you want to deploy a network firewall as-a-service.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic WAN)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit and Magic WAN products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks and replace your MPLS WAN.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against malicious traffic and DDoS attacks.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic WAN + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic WAN and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to replace your MPLS WAN and deploy a network firewall as-a-service.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic WAN + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit, Magic WAN, and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against malicious traffic and DDoS attacks, and replace your MPLS WAN.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Free Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Cloudflare Zero Trust Free plan because you need to protect fewer than 50 users and are okay self-serving when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Standard Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Standard Zero Trust plan because you indicated that you would like to be able to email or chat with us online when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Enterprise Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Zero Trust Enterprise plan because you indicated that you would like to speak to a live person when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Workers)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Workers product because you indicated that you're building a back-end API or serverless function.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Pages)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Pages product because you indicated that you're building a front-end application.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Workers + Pages)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Workers + Pages products because you indicated that you're building a full-stack application.

planFeatures.title: Free Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate your personal or hobby website.

planFeatures.title: Pro Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate your professional, non-business-critical website.

planFeatures.title: Business Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate applications for your small online business.

planFeatures.title: Enterprise Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate applications that are core to your business.
coreFeatures: 24x7x365 support via email, chat, and phone
Access to all Cloudflare products and add-ons

planFeatures.title: Magic Transit
planFeatures.description: Protect public-facing subnets from DDoS attacks using the Cloudflare global network
coreFeatures: Deliver always-on protection within three seconds
Neutralize attack traffic using Cloudflare's %{DataCenterCount} data centers

planFeatures.title: Magic Firewall
planFeatures.description: Deploy firewall protection from the cloud to protect your enterprise network
coreFeatures: Filter layer 3 and 4 traffic without hardware appliances
Maintain global visibility and control from a central location
Integrate with Magic Transit and Magic WAN

planFeatures.title: Magic WAN
planFeatures.description: Replace MPLS with the Cloudflare connectivity cloud
coreFeatures: Simplify branch connectivity with Cloudflare's network and private backbone
Deploy Magic WAN Connector on-site or in the cloud to auto-connect and steer traffic
Pair with Cloudflare One for firewalling, Zero Trust, and data protection
Add Argo Smart Routing for optimal performance

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Free Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to harness the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.
coreFeatures: Up to 24 hours of logging activity

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Standard Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to harness the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.
coreFeatures: Up to 30 days of logging activity

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Enterprise
planFeatures.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to harness the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.
coreFeatures: Up to six months of logging activity
24x7x365 support via phone, email, and chat

planFeatures.title: Workers
planFeatures.description: Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe for exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
coreFeatures: Automatic global deployments to hundreds of data centers
High performance runtime with no cold starts
Support for JavaScript and over 10 other languages
Charges for CPU time only — not idle time
Easy integration with other developer services

planFeatures.title: Pages
planFeatures.description: Quickly build, deploy, and deliver trusted full-stack applications with popular front-end frameworks.
coreFeatures: Unmatched performance from Cloudflare's edge network
